ValidationRule.description: This should stop the insertion of deleted events being reinserted from outlook sync
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.DeveloperName = "HOT_Events", BEGINS(Subject, "SA-"), ISBLANK(WhatId), CONTAINS(Description, "Link til TinD: https://navdialog") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Event cannot be saved: Missing linked record (WhatId) for HOT Event with TinD link.
